import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Button, Container } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { fetchCart } from "../redux/action/cart"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getImage } from "../utils"; import { addAddress } from "../redux/action/address"; import { FiChevronRight } from "react-icons/fi"; const Shipping = ({ fetchCart, cart, addAddress, loading, success }) => { useEffect(() => { fetchCart(); }, []); let cartItems = cart?.order_items; const history = useHistory(); if (cartItems?.length < 1) { return history.goBack(); } document.title = `Shipping | Luxury Silk Online`; return ( <>

Luxury Silk

Information {" "} Shipping {" "} Payment

Contact

+254795772333

Change
Ship to

Siaya 57, Kalulu, Kalulu, Siaya, 57, Kenya

Change

Shipping Method

Shipping within Nairobi

KES 300.00

Shipping in greater Nairobi areas e.g Limuru, Syokimau, Ngong, Rongai, Ruiru, Utawala, Buruburu, Ruaka, Lower Kabete, Juja etc.

KES 400.00

Shipping outside Nairobi but within Kenya e.g Thika, Athi River, Nakuru, Kisumu, Eldoret, Meru, Murang'a, Embu etc.

KES 500.00

Return to information {cartItems?.length > 0 && ( )}

Order summary

{cartItems?.length === 0 && ( <>

Your cart is empty

Continue Shopping
)} {cartItems?.length > 0 && ( <>
3 ? "checkout-orders scroll" : "checkout-orders" }> {cartItems && cartItems.map((item) => (
{item?.quantity}

{item?.item}

{item?.item_obj.weight} / {item?.item_obj.category}{" "} / Peppermint

KSh. {item?.final_price.toFixed(2)}

))}

Subtotal

KSh. {cart?.total.toFixed(2)}

Shipping

KSh. 300.00

Total

KSh. {cart?.total.toFixed(2)}

)}
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ cart: state.cart.shoppingCart, loading: state.address.loading, success: state.address.success, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { fetchCart, addAddress })(Shipping);
